on reading compounds: 秤量【ヒョウリョウ】measuring weight, weighing, maximum weight (on a scales)
天秤【テンビン】(balance) scales, shoulder carrying pole, steelyard
化学天秤【カガクテンビン】chemical balance
kun reading compounds: 秤にかける【はかりにかける】to weigh on a scale, to weigh up options, to compare pros and cons
直示はかり【ちょくじはかり】direct-reading balance, direct-reading scales
